info.name: Tutanota v2 | Hello from USA!
info.description:
Looking for v1? https://userstyles.org/styles/134117/tutanota-secure-email-for-everybody

Once you sign up for your account, install this style and you'll have access to an improved layout. 

• increased height for mail items
• imported Open Sans font from Google
* must uncomment body and @import (only works in Chrome)
• header mail items easier to read
• subject font is larger and has padding
• increased width for mail items
• replicated similar style from gmail
• removed all borders
• added comments
• faster to move mouse and click settings  / email
• moved delete button closer to left pane
• bulk delete button also moved left
• removed fluffy avatar graphic
